message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30.  It's best to settle this now before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, that's not a very fair deal. How about we split it a bit more evenly this time? I propose 60/40.
Bob, time is money!  I'll take $65, leaving you with $35.  Another round and that offer will be smaller!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm trying to be fair, but you're just stalling. 55/45 is my final offer.
